last_episode_to_air.name: Roommate Wanted (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bachman's old roommates recount the steps they took to try to force him from their homes, his harsh retaliations, and the painful saga's tragic end.

name: Worst Roommate Ever
overview: Violent con artists. Stone-cold killers. These terrifying true stories unveil some of the worst cohabitation experiences one could ever imagine.

episodes.name: Call Me Grandma
episodes.overview: A woman known as Dorothea Puente runs a boarding house for those less fortunate, but her seeming benevolence belies motives that are much darker.

episodes.name: Be Careful of the Quiet Ones
episodes.overview: When college student Maribel Ramos goes missing, detectives turn their focus to her roommate, K.C. Joy — the last person to have seen her alive.

episodes.name: Marathon Man
episodes.overview: Charismatic athlete Youssef Khater commits fraud across several countries — a series of schemes culminating in violent attacks on multiple people.

episodes.name: Roommate Wanted (1)
episodes.overview: Former roommates of "serial squatter" Jamison Bachman discuss how this dark, dangerous man conned his way into their homes and then refused to leave.

episodes.name: Roommate Wanted (2)
episodes.overview: Bachman's old roommates recount the steps they took to try to force him from their homes, his harsh retaliations, and the painful saga's tragic end.
